articles.title: Banquet Given for Indonesian Party Delegation
articles.content:
Banquet Given for Indonesian Party Delegation

					Pyongyang, September 12 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea hosted a banquet in honor of the delegation of the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Monday.
					
					Present there on invitation were the members of the Indonesian delegation headed by General Chairwoman of its Central Directive Council Megawati Soekarnoputri and Nasri Gustaman, Indonesian ambassador to the DPRK.
					
					Present there were Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, Pak Kun Gwang, vice department director of the C.C., the WPK, and officials of the C.C., the WPK.
					
					Choe Thae Bok in his speech referred to the fact that the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle has conducted positive activities for social progress and prosperity and the interests of the working masses and the improvement of their positions, steadily expanding and strengthening the party.
					
					He expressed the will of the WPK to make positive efforts to boost the friendly relations with the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle in the idea of independence, peace and friendship in the future, too.
					
					Megawatti Soekarnoputri said that President Sukarno and President Kim Il Sung laid the foundation of the friendly relations between Indonesia and the DPRK.
					
					The Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle is working hard to boost the relations between the two parties, governments and peoples, she noted.
					
					She wished the flower garden of friendship between the two countries to be in fuller bloom together with Kimilsungia.

articles.title: Seoul Municipal Symphony Orchestra Music Director and His Party Here
articles.content:
Seoul Municipal Symphony Orchestra Music Director and His Party Here

					Pyongyang, September 12 (KCNA) -- Jong Myong Hun, music director of the Seoul Municipal Symphony Orchestra, and his party arrived here Monday.

articles.title: Visits
articles.content:
Visits

					Pyongyang, September 12 (KCNA) -- Arrivals here on Monday were a delegation of the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle led by General Chairwoman of its Central Directive Council Megawati Soekarnoputri and a delegation of the Ministry of the External Affairs of the Republic of India led by its secretary for East Asia Sanjay Singh.  
					
					Leaving here on the same day were the delegation of the Central Committee of the Fatherland Front of Vietnam led by its Vice-President Le Ba Trinh and the delegation of the Vietnam General Confederation of Labor led by its Chairman Dang Ngoc Tung.
